2.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Increases the duration of "Condemnation" by 2.
4 seconds.
Applies a stacking Divine Sentence effect.
Using Crusader Blow decreases cost of your next "Purifying Strike" by 25%.
This effect stacks up to 2 times.
2.name: Crusader_Blow
2.title: Crusader Blow

4.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage plus an additional 17117 damage for each stack of the Divine Sentence effect.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
4.name: Retribution
4.title: Retribution

6.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the stored damage in the first holy barrier by !e1%.
Breaks the holy barrier.
6.name: Overcome
6.title: Overcome

7.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCauses you to rush to the target and inflicts !e1 to !e2 physical damage.
In addition, the target will be knocked down for 2 seconds.
Minimum distance is 8 yards.
7.name: Strike_of_Justice
7.title: Strike of Justice

8.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Condemnation effect which inflicts !e1 damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.
8.name: Condemnation
8.title: Condemnation

9.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Light Infusion effect to the party member with the least amount of health which absorbs !e1 physical or Shadow damage over !e2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
9.name: Light_Infusion
9.title: Light Infusion

10.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Applies the Divine Sentence effect.
10.name: Purifying_Strike
10.title: Purifying Strike

11.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRecites a prayer that inflicts !e1 to damage.
Applies the Righteous Word effect for 8 seconds that grants your attacks 100% additional threat and causes them to extend the duration of the effect.
11.name: Righteous_Word
11.title: Righteous Word

12.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and decreases the target's movement speed by 50% for !e2 seconds.
Causes your attacks to increase the duration of the Immobilize effect by 2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
12.name: Immobilize
12.title: Immobilize

13.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and all enemies within a !e2 yard radius.
Causes "Condemnation" to spread to all enemies within a !e3 yard radius if the target is affected by "Condemnation".
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
13.name: Holy_Wrath
13.title: Holy Wrath

14.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the stored damage in the first holy barrier by !e1 Refreshes the duration of the holy barrier and makes it the last one in line.
Does not break the holy barrier.
14.name: Tenacity
14.title: Tenacity

15.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRecites a prayer that restores !e1 health to all party members within 20 yards.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
15.name: Solemn_Prayer
15.title: Solemn Prayer

16.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and makes the target unable to see for !e3 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
16.name: Shining_Sword
16.title: Shining Sword

17.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRemoves all of the stored damage in the first holy barrier and breaks it.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
17.name: Deliverance
17.title: Deliverance

18.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage over 12 seconds the next time the target receives direct Holy damage.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
18.name: Sacred_Sunrise
18.title: Sacred Sunrise

19.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases your armor by 30%.
Your weapon attacks increase the physical damage done by your party members by !e1%.
Cast this spell again to remove the effect.
You cannot use this spell when your shield is equipped.
19.name: Aura_of_Ferocity
19.title: Aura of Ferocity

20.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the energy cost of your spells by !e1% and increases the cooldown of holy barrier abilities by !e2% for 20 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light and 1 Canon of Purity.*
20.name: Virtuous_Cause
20.title: Virtuous Cause

21.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Increases the duration of "Condemnation" by 2.
5 seconds.
Applies the Divine Sentence effect.
Using Crusader Seal decreases cost of your next "Purifying Strike" by 25%.
This effect stacks up to 2 times.
21.name: Crusader_Seal
21.title: Crusader Seal

22.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage plus an additional 17117 damage for each stack of the Divine Sentence effect.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
22.name: Reckoning
22.title: Reckoning

23.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and all enemies within a !e2 yard radius.
Causes "Condemnation" to spread to all enemies within a !e3 yard radius if the target is affected by "Condemnation".
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
23.name: Divine_Wrath
23.title: Divine Wrath

24.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Light Immersion effect to the party member with the least amount of health which absorbs !e1 physical or Shadow damage over !e2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
24.name: Light_Immersion
24.title: Light Immersion

25.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Fire damage per second and prevents from using abilities.
Duration: !e2 seconds.
*Consumes 2 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality reduces the cooldown.
25.name: Autodafe
25.title: Autodafe

26.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases the damage you deal by 21% and allows using any melee combat abilities from a distance of 21 yards.
Duration: 12 seconds.
*Consumes 6 Tears of Dragon.*
Additional damage and melee attack range are increased if Tears of Dragons of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Pious_Anger
26.title: Pious Anger

27.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to all surrounding enemies.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light and 1 Canon of Purity.*
27.name: Chastising_Strike
27.title: Chastising Strike

28.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Shining Sword" by !e1%.
28.name: Blinding_Light
28.title: Blinding Light

29.body:
!lvl !cost !dEvery successful dodge grants you a !e1% chance to apply the Counterblow effect to an enemy.
Your next successful hit on a target with this effect will inflict !e2 Holy damage.
29.name: Counterblow
29.title: Counterblow

31.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants your "Immobilize" a 100% chance to silence the target for 4 seconds.
!e1 second cooldown.
31.name: Seal_of_Silence
31.title: Seal of Silence

32.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen the Divine Sentence effect is removed, the target receives !e1 Holy damage per stack.
32.name: Searing_Justice
32.title: Searing Justice

33.body: !lvl !cost !dYou inflict !e1% more damage to enemies whose health is 50% or lower.
33.name: Certain_Victory
33.title: Certain Victory

34.body:
!lvl !cost !dEach successful parry, dodge, and block grants you the Inspiration effect that increases your Agility and Endurance by 1% per stack.
Effect stacks up to !e1 times and lasts 15 seconds.
34.name: Combat_Inspiration
34.title: Combat Inspiration

35.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your "Crusader Blow", "Crusader Seal", "Purifying Strike" and "Shining Sword" by !e1%.
35.name: Mighty_Strikes
35.title: Mighty Strikes

36.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Retribution" and "Reckoning" abilities have a 20% chance to inflict 12161 additional Holy damage over 8 seconds when you have a two-handed weapon equipped.
This chance is increased by 10% per each Divine Sentence effect.
36.name: Strength_of_Justice
36.title: Strength of Justice

38.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your "Retribution" and "Reckoning" by !e1%, and the damage of your "Sacred Sunrise" by !e2%.
38.name: Power_of_Purity
38.title: Power of Purity

39.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour successful "Crusader Blow" and "Crusader Seal" strikes grant you a Concentration effect that lasts 10 seconds, stacks up to !e1 times, and increases damage of "Crusader Blow", "Crusader Seal", and "Purifying Strike" by 2.
5% per stack.
Using any ability on another target will remove the effect.
39.name: Concentration
39.title: Concentration

40.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Crusader Blow", "Crusader Seal", "Strike of Justice", "Purifying Strike", "Retribution", and "Reckoning" by !e1%.
Decreases the energy cost of your "Purifying Strike", "Crusader Blow", and "Crusader Seal" by !e2%.
40.name: Onslaught
40.title: Onslaught

41.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical chance of your "Crusader Blow", "Crusader Seal", "Purifying Strike", "Retribution", "Reckoning", "Shining Sword" and "Shield Slam" by !e1%
41.name: Angelic_Harbinger
41.title: Angelic Harbinger

44.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCalls upon the light to resurrect a friendly target with a small amount of health.
Can be used in combat.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
44.name: Reparation
44.title: Reparation

46.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Light Infusion", "Light Immersion", "Solemn Prayer", and "Reparation" abilities by !e1%, and decreases their energy cost by !e2%.
46.name: Devoted_Plea
46.title: Devoted Plea

48.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Virtuous Cause" by !e1%.
48.name: Speed_of_Light
48.title: Speed of Light

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases critical chance of "Righteous Word", "Holy Wrath", and "Divine Wrath" by !e1%.
Increases the periodic damage of "Condemnation" by !e2%.
49.name: Purifier
49.title: Purifier

50.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cast time of "Sacred Sunrise" by !e1%.
50.name: Solar_Swiftness
50.title: Solar Swiftness

52.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the healing of "Solemn Prayer" by !e1%.
Increases the healing and duration of "Light Infusion" and "Light Immersion" by !e2%
52.name: Faith_Healing
52.title: Faith Healing

53.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Righteous Word", "Holy Wrath", "Divine Wrath", and "Immobilize" by !e1%.
53.name: Martyr's_Gift
53.title: Martyr's Gift

54.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dForces the target to attack you for 10 seconds.
When used on another player, the duration is 5 seconds and its cooldown is increased by 100%.
Your next two melee attacks on the target will each increase the effect's duration by 2.
5 seconds.
The target of this effect will inflict 50% less damage to everyone but you.
The target must inflict damage equal to 20% of your total health to be able to switch to another target.
*Consumes one Canon of Light.*
54.name: Challenge
54.title: Challenge

55.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Righteous Word", "Holy Wrath", and "Divine Wrath" by !e1%.
55.name: Righteous_Force
55.title: Righteous Force

56.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Righteous Word" inflicts !e1 periodic damage and generates !e2% additional threat.
56.name: Guilty_Conscience
56.title: Guilty Conscience

58.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen a party member dies your next 10 attacks inflict an additional 153342 Holy damage.
Effect lasts 20 seconds.
58.name: Vengeance
58.title: Vengeance

59.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your area-of-effect attacks by !e1%, and decreases incoming damage by !e2% when fighting against 3 or more enemies at a time.
59.name: Just_Defender
59.title: Just Defender

62.body: !lvl !cost !dYou receive !e1% less damage when you break a holy barrier.
62.name: Absolution
62.title: Absolution

63.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Overcome", "Deliverance", and "Tenacity" abilities by !e1%.
Decreases energy cost of your "Overcome" and "Deliverance" abilities by !e2%.
63.name: Protection_of_Faith
63.title: Protection of Faith

65.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the damage stored in your holy barriers by !e1% every 3 seconds.
65.name: Pulsing_Rays
65.title: Pulsing Rays

66.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRestores all Canons of Light, but all damage stored in the first holy barrier is inflicted to you.
66.name: Self_Sacrifice
66.title: Self Sacrifice

67.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts 0 damage and knocks the target down.
Dispels the Divine Sentence effect, inflicting additional 0 damage per stack.
*Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
67.name: Shield_Slam
67.title: Shield Slam

68.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your Rage by !e1% while the "Virtuous Cause" effect is active.
Increases the duration of the "Virtuous Cause" effect by !e2%.
68.name: Righteous_Rage
68.title: Righteous Rage

69.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your holy barrier absorbs a critical hit the cooldown of "Overcome", "Deliverance", "Vindication", and "Self Sacrifice" abilities is decreased by !e1 seconds.
This effect may not happen more than once every 4 seconds.
69.name: Fortitude
69.title: Fortitude

70.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your healing received by !e1% for 10 seconds and restores !e2 points of energy after a holy barrier is fades.
70.name: Departing_Light
70.title: Departing Light

71.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your health drops below !e1%, !e2% of your total health will be restored to you.
This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
71.name: Miraculous_Recovery
71.title: Miraculous Recovery

72.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBreaks the first holy barrier and inflicts !e1% of the stored damage to the target.
* Consumes one Canon of Light and one Canon of Purity.*
72.name: Vindication
72.title: Vindication
